description: Data from raw material inputs, quarrying, and feed preparation

fields.limestone_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of limestone
fields.clay_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of clay/shale
fields.iron_ore_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of iron ore
fields.gypsum_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of gypsum
fields.laterite_feed_tph: float, tonnes per hour of laterite
fields.limestone_moisture_pct: float, percentage of moisture in limestone
fields.clay_moisture_pct: float, percentage of moisture in clay
fields.avg_particle_size_mm: float, average particle size in millimeters
fields.crusher_power_kw: float, power consumed by crusher in kW
fields.conveyor_speed_mps: float, conveyor belt speed in meters per second
fields.CO2_emission_kgph: float, carbon dioxide emissions in kilograms per hour
fields.dust_concentration_mgpm3: float, dust concentration in milligrams per cubic meter
fields.crusher_status: integer, status of the crusher (0: Off, 1: On)
